description.zh: 这是一个基于大语言模型（LLM）的应用程序，利用检索增强生成（RAG）技术实现与YouTube视频的对话。它通过youtube-transcript-api提取视频字幕，并借助OpenAI的GPT-4o等模型，根据视频内容回答用户问题。该应用通过AI驱动的对话提升对视频内容的理解和互动体验。
description.en: This is an LLM-powered application that enables users to chat with YouTube videos using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG). It extracts video transcripts via the youtube-transcript-api and leverages models like OpenAI's GPT-4o to answer questions based on video content. The app enhances understanding and interaction with video material through AI-driven conversations.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过AI实现与YouTube视频内容的交互式问答
- 提升长视频内容的可访问性和理解效率
- 利用强大的大语言模型和RAG技术提供准确、上下文感知的回答

## 功能列表:

- 输入YouTube视频URL
- 对视频内容提出问题
- 使用RAG和选定的大语言模型获取准确答案
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Enables interactive Q&A with YouTube video content using AI
- Improves accessibility and comprehension of long-form video content
- Leverages powerful LLMs and RAG for accurate, context-aware responses

## Features:

- Input a YouTube video URL
- Ask questions about the content of the video
- Get accurate answers using RAG and the selected LLM
